name: Intergalactic Flat Earther's Discovery
description:
An immortal Flat Earther must defend the only inhabitant of a flat planet:
A living house!

  • Feed the house with your enemies!
  • Prevent enemies from attacking the weak point of the house: Behind the armpits!
  • Get all the points you can (without the house dying) and get a spot in the online ranking!
  • Cause the chaos with bounces and headers!
  • Throw enemies away!
  • Practice aiming at the wall!

Save the house, save the flat world!

*Restriction: Only Unity Models from "Survival Shooter" pack.
